info.description: A collection of RESTful APIs to provide access to Adobe Analytics features and data.
info.title: Analytics Services

tags.name: favorites
tags.description: Operations on managing favorites on components

tags.name: metrics
tags.description: Retrieves a List of Metrics for the Given Report Suite

get.description:
A calculated metric response will always include these default items: *id, name, description, rsid, owner* 

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field:

* *modified*: Date that the metric was last modified (ISO 8601)
* *definition*: Calculated metric definition as JSON object
* *compatibility*: Products that the metric is compatible with
* *reportSuiteName*: Also return the friendly Report Suite name for the RSID
* *favorite*: True if calculated metric has been marked as a 'Favorite'
* *tags*: Gives all existing tags associated with the calculated metric
* *approved*: True if calculated metric has been marked as 'Approved'
* *shares*: Gives all existing shares for the calculated metric
* *sharesFullName*: Give 'shares', but also include the shared-to user's friendly login name as 'shareToDisplayName' in each share object
* *ownerFullName*: Add friendly full login name (string) to the 'owner' object

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics that contains the Name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (base 0 - first page is "0")

400.description: Unable to retrieve list of calculated metrics shared with user

401.description: Owner filter error; user specified is not in the same company as the requesting user

403.description: Requesting non-shared calculated metrics for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric retrieval failed

post.description:
Creates a new calculated metric. The following attributes are available when creating a calculated metric:

IMPORTANT: Required Fields: name, definition, rsid

Optional fields: description

Example definition for use in testing API below ("Page exists"):

```json

{"definition":{},"version":[1,0,0]}
```

A calculated metric response will always include these default items:* id, name, description, rsid, owner* 

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field as defined/documented in the GET endpoints (see GET "/calculatedmetrics" or GET "/calculatedmetrics/{id}" for more documentation).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs for calculated metric creation.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric create or retrieval failed

get.summary: Retrieve a single calculated metric by id
get.description:
A calculated metric response will always include these default items: *id, name, description, rsid, owner* 

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field:

* *modified*: Date that the metric was last modified (ISO 8601)
* *definition*: Calculated metric definition as JSON object
* *compatibility*: Products that the metric is compatible with
* *reportSuiteName*: Also return the friendly Report Suite name for the RSID
* *favorite*: True if calculated metric has been marked as a 'Favorite'
* *tags*: Gives all existing tags associated with the calculated metric
* *approved*: True if calculated metric has been marked as 'Approved'
* *shares*: Gives all existing shares for the calculated metric
* *sharesFullName*: Give 'shares', but also include the shared-to user's friendly login name as 'shareToDisplayName' in each share object
* *ownerFullName*: Add friendly full login name (string) to the 'owner' object

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The calculated metric ID to retrieve

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

403.description: Requesting non-shared calculated metrics for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; calculated metric retrieval failed

put.description:
The following fields can be modified through this endpoint:
name, description, definition, owner, rsidExample "defintion" for use in testing API below ("Page exists"):
"definition":{},"version":[1,0,0]}

Response will be the newly modified calculated metric object after the update request completes.

CalculatedMetricResponse
A calculated metric response will always include these default items:* id, name, description, rsid, owner* Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field as defined/documented in the GET endpoints (see GET "/calculatedmetrics" or GET "/calculatedmetrics/{id}" for more documentation).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Calculated Metric ID to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs to be updated.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

400.description: Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object

401.description: Company mismatch; calculated metric ownership can only be transferred within the same organization

403.description: User does not have permission to update this calculated metric

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric update or retrieval failed

delete.summary: Deletion of Calculated Metrics by Id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The calculated metric ID to be deleted

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric delete failed

get.summary: Retrieves report suites that match the given filters.

parameters.name: rsids
parameters.description: Filter list to only include suites in this RSID list (comma-delimited)

parameters.name: rsidContains
parameters.description: Filter list to only include suites whose rsid contains rsidContains.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (base 0 - first page is "0")

500.description: Unexpected error; report suite retrieval failed

get.summary: Returns a list of dimensions for a given report suite.

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: A Report Suite ID

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

401.description: User does not have access to this report suite

get.summary: Returns a dimension for the given report suite

parameters.name: dimensionId
parameters.description: The dimension ID. For example a valid id is a value like 'evar1'

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: The report suite ID.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to use for returning system named dimensions.

get.summary: Returns a list of favorite objects for the current user meeting the paging restriction
get.description: Returns an array of all of the favorites objects tied to the company. Setting a very large page size will return the list in a single request, but it may be more data than you expect and you may experience performance issues.

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: The component type to filter on. Required if also using componentIds filter.

parameters.name: componentIds
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of componentIds to filter on. Must also pass componentType.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: The user ID to return details for. Only admins may use this option.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (base 0 - first page is "0")

post.summary: Creates 'favorite' records for a given component
post.description: Accepts an array of Favorite objects to allow creation of one or many 'favorite' records in a single call.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON-formatted ARRAY containing a list of favorite objects

delete.summary: Deletes favorites by componentId. Accepts a list of componentIds and deletes any "Favorites" associated with them

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: The component type to operate on.

parameters.name: componentIds
parameters.description: A comma separated list of component Ids

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the "Favorite" record to return

delete.summary: Deletes the "Favorite" with the given id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the favorite

400.description: Attempting to remove a favorite by id that does not exist

403.description: Attempting to remove a favorite for a user other than the authenticated user

get.summary: Returns a list of metrics for the given report suite
get.description: This returns the metrics list primarily for the Analytics product. The platform identity API Returns a list of all possible metrics for the supported systems.

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: ID of desired report suite ie. sistr2

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale that system named metrics should be returned in

get.summary: Returns a metric for the given report suite

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the metric for which to retrieve info. Note ids are values like pageviews, not metrics/pageviews

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: ID of desired report suite ie. sistr2

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale that system named metrics should be returned in

post.summary: Runs a ranked report for the report in the post body
post.description: See the [Reporting Interface wiki page](https://wiki.corp.adobe.com/display/scservices/Reporting+Interface) for details.

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

get.summary: Retrieves all segments, or paginated segments
get.description:
A segment response will always include these default items:
id,name,description,rsid,owner

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field:
modified: Date that the segment was last modified (ISO 8601)
definition: Segment definition as JSON object
compatibility: Products that the segment is compatible with
reportSuiteName: Also return the friendly Report Suite name for the RSID
legacyId: Legacy segment ID from old segment database (only exists if the segment was migrated from the old segment DB)
dwInUse: True if the segment is currently in use in a DW request
asiInUse: True if the segment is currently in use in an ASI slot
aamStatus: Returns AAM/Raven publishing status (cross-product segment sharing)
favorite: True if segment has been marked as a 'Favorite'
tags: Gives all existing tags associated with the segment
approved: True if segment has been marked as 'Approved'
shares: Gives all existing shares for the segment
sharesFullName: Give 'shares', but also include the shared-to user's friendly login name as 'shareToDisplayName' in each share object
ownerFullName: Add friendly full login name (string) to the 'owner' object
isDeleted: Returns whether or not the segment is 'Deleted' (note that deleted segments are only returned if requested by ID)

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional segment metadata fields to include on response.

parameters.name: filterByIds
parameters.description: Filter list to only include segments in the specified list (comma-delimited list of IDs) (this is the same as segmentFilter, and is overwritten by segmentFilter

parameters.name: includeType
parameters.description: Include additional segments not owned by user. The "all" option takes precedence over "shared"

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter list to only include segments that contains the Name

parameters.name: tagNames
parameters.description: Filter list to only include segments that contains one of the tags

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (base 0 - first page is "0")

400.description: Unable to retrieve list of segments shared with user

401.description: Owner filter error; user specified is not in the same company as the requesting user

403.description: Requesting non-shared segments for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; Segment retrieval failed

post.description:
Creates a new segment. The following attributes are available when creating a segment:
Required: name, definition, rsid
Optional: description, aamStatus

Note: "aamStatus" is used to "publish" a report suite segment to other products in the Experience Cloud. Description is always required when publishing with aamStatus. The report suite must already be pre-configured for AAM for publishing to succeed (see the "/segments/aamStatus/" endpoint for more information).
Format for aamStatus object:
"aamStatus":{"published":["rsid1","rsid2"]}

Example definition for use in testing API below ("Page exists"):
"definition":{"func":"segment","container":{"func":"container","context":"hits","pred":{"func":"exists","description":"Page","val":{"func":"attr","name":"variables/page"}}},"version":[1,0,0]}

SegmentResponse
A segment response will always include these default items:
id, name, description, rsid, owner
Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field as defined/documented in the GET endpoints (see GET "/segments" or GET "/segments/{id}" for more documentation).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs for segment creation.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

500.description: External API error; Segment create or retrieval failed

get.summary: Retrieves a single segment by ID
get.description:
A segment response will always include these default items:
id,name,description,rsid,owner

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field:
modified: Date that the segment was last modified (ISO 8601)
definition: Segment definition as JSON object
compatibility: Products that the segment is compatible with
reportSuiteName: Also return the friendly Report Suite name for the RSID
legacyId: Legacy segment ID from old segment database (only exists if the segment was migrated from the old segment DB)
dwInUse: True if the segment is currently in use in a DW request
asiInUse: True if the segment is currently in use in an ASI slot
aamStatus: Returns AAM/Raven publishing status (cross-product segment sharing)
favorite: True if segment has been marked as a 'Favorite'
tags: Gives all existing tags associated with the segment
approved: True if segment has been marked as 'Approved'
shares: Gives all existing shares for the segment
sharesFullName: Give 'shares', but also include the shared-to user's friendly login name as 'shareToDisplayName' in each share object
ownerFullName: Add friendly full login name (string) to the 'owner' object
isDeleted: Returns whether or not the segment is 'Deleted' (note that deleted segments are only returned if requested by ID)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The segment ID to retrieve

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional segment metadata fields to include on response.

403.description: Requesting non-shared segments for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; segment retrieval failed

put.summary: Make changes or updates to an existing segment
put.description:
The following fields can be modified through this endpoint:
name, description, definition, owner, rsid, aamStatus

Note: "aamStatus" is used to "publish" a report suite segment to other products in the Experience Cloud. Description is always required when publishing with aamStatus. The report suite must already be pre-configured for AAM for publishing to succeed (see the "/segments/aamStatus/" endpoint for more information).
Format for aamStatus object:
"aamStatus":{"published":["rsid1","rsid2"]}

Example "defintion" for use in testing API below ("Page exists"):
"definition":{"func":"segment","container":{"func":"container","context":"hits","pred":{"func":"exists","description":"Page","val":{"func":"attr","name":"variables/page"}}},"version":[1,0,0]}

Response will be the newly modified segment object after the update request completes.

SegmentResponse
A segment response will always include these default items:
id, name, description, rsid, owner
Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field as defined/documented in the GET endpoints (see GET "/segments" or GET "/segments/{id}" for more documentation).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Segment ID to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs to be updated.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

400.description: Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object

401.description: Company mismatch; segment ownership can only be transferred within the same organization

403.description: User does not have permission to update this segment

500.description: External API error; Segment update or retrieval failed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The segment ID to be deleted

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale

500.description: External API error; Segment delete failed

get.summary: Returns a list of tags for the current user's company

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (base 0 - first page is "0")

500.description: Unable to retrieve list of tags for user.

post.summary: Saves the given tag(s) for the current user's company
post.description: Allows creation of a new tag and applies that new tag to the passed component

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON-formatted array of Tag objects containing key-value pairs

500.description: Unable to save list of tags.

delete.summary: Disassociates all tags from the given components
delete.description: Removes all tags from the passed componentIds. Note that currently this is done in a single DB query, so there is a single combined response for the entire operation.

parameters.name: componentIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of componentIds to operate on.

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: The component type to operate on.

500.description: Unable to remove tags for given components.

get.summary: Retrieves an tag by its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Tag ID to be retrieved

404.description: Unable to find a tag with the given ID

500.description: Unexpected server error while trying to retrieve tag

delete.summary: Removes the tagId and all associations from that tag to any components
delete.description: Delete by tagId. Will un-tag any/all components that were associated with the passed tagId.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The tagId to be deleted

404.description: The given tagId does not exist

500.description: Unable to delete the given tagId.

rsid.description: The report suite id for which the component was created/updated

reportSuiteName.description: The report suite name for which the component was created/updated

polarity.description: Set metric polarity, which indicates whether it's good or bad if a given metric goes up. Default=positive

precision.description: Number of decimal places to include in calculated metric result

reportSuiteName.description: The friendly name for the report suite id.

owner.description: The owner of the segment as an Owner object.

isDeleted.description: Whether or not the segment is 'Deleted' (deleted segments are only returned if requested by id)

definition.description: The segment definition as a JSON object

approved.description: Whether or not the segment has been marked approved.

favorite.description: Whether or not the segment has been marked as a favorite.

usageSummary.description: How frequently the user uses this segment.

siteTitle.description: A name for the report suite.  This is deprecated and should use the report suite name instead.

tags.description: All existing tags associated with the segment.

adminLogin.description: Login of the main user responsible for the login company

globalCompanyKey.description: System generated cross data-center unique company id

validEmails.description: List of allowed email address domains for users in the company

id.description: the login id of the owner

name.description: the friendly full login name of the owner, included when the expansion parameter ownerFullName is true

login.description: the friendly full login name of the owner, included when the expansion parameter ownerFullName is true

parentRsid.description: Parent report suite id for virtual report suite

components.description: the list of components that have been tagged with this tag
